normalized: the next day, i went about my work at the computerterminal in the tactical control room like nothing hadever happened.
the space coordinates of the current position of thespace investigation convoy was displaying on a small window.
normally, space ships got around by using wormholes,which made the cruising time of even the longest distancesno more than half a day.
but this planet was still at a civilization level thathadn't been sanctioned and thus a wormhole hadn't beenconnected to it.
and so, schedules have to be made to transfer the spaceship to the nearest solar system in cases where the intention is to visit this planet.
and now, a convoy of dozuma members that had slipped intothe space investigation were on their way to earth fromthe vicinity of saturn.
in short, that figure indicated the time limit i had inbeing able to carry out my revenge towards misleet.

name: yuu
normalized: i guess i'm going to have to hasten things along…
i had to finally break misleet's body and mind.
i was now entering into the final stages of the revengeand had to prepare accordingly.
now that i thought about it, a decision needed to be made.
